description.en:
TenX is a payment platform that facilitates digital and physical modes of transaction for cryptocurrencies to any merchant, even if they don’t accept cryptocurrencies. Physical and digital modes of course, include bank accounts, wallets, debit cards, cash and much more. The primary agenda of the company is to make it easier and faster to use cryptocurrency and accelerate adoption for the industry. The TenX blockchain supports the PAY token, which is the fuel that runs the network and is the cryptocurrency using which transactions on the network are made. 

TenX came into existence in 2011 and was created by Toby Hoenisch. While at the university, he took a keen interest in cryptography though he believed that there was no success for cryptocurrencies.In 2012, Toby started trading Bitcoin when he got to know a member of bitcoin-community who was not able to open an account in bank and used TenX crypto currency instead. Toby Hoenisch and Michael Sperk started a one-bit start up in 2015 and introduced us to a debit card, through which payments with bitcoin could be done. 

Cryptocurrency adoption is a longstanding problem - with most cryptocurrencies remaining relegated to the realms of hype and not seeing real-world usage, not as much as the enthusiasts would like, at least. This is an important problem being solved by the TenX coin, which seeks to make it easy for the end user to use cryptocurrencies by removing the hurdles associated with keeping different wallets and using them separately. As with all other investments, it is wise to do your own research, but seeing that TenX seems to be solving unique problems, it may certainly be worth a look.

description.ko:
텐엑스페이토큰은 가상화폐를 기반으로 한 체크카드와 모바일 지갑을 제공하는 플랫폼에서 사용되는 토큰입니다. 텐엑스페이토큰은 현재 비트코인, 이더리움, 이더리움에 기초한 다른 토큰(ERC20), 대시를 지원하며, 앞으로 더 코인의 폭을 늘려나갈 예정입니다. 

VISA, Mastercard와 제휴한 텐엑스페이토큰은 이 두 가지로 결제 가능한 모든 오프라인, 온라인 상점(약 200개국 3천 6백만 개의 가맹점)에서 사용될 수 있으며, 이때 적용되는 소비 및 환전 수수료는 0%라고 합니다. 

텐엑스페이토큰은 체크카드와 모바일 지갑 외에도 은행 계좌, ATM 등의 영역으로 더 확장할 계획이며, 궁극적으로 가상화폐를 실제 세상에서 쉽게 사용할 수 있도록 하는 것을 목표로 합니다. 

코인 특징
1. 텐엑스페이토큰 토큰은 이더리움 블록체인을 기초로 하는 ERC20 토큰이며, 텐엑스페이토큰 직불 카드를 통해 결제된 금액의 0.5%는 토큰 보유자에게 돌아갑니다. 카드 소지자에게는 0.1%의 보상이 주어지며, 이들은 모두 이더리움으로 지급됩니다. 

2. 텐엑스페이토큰은 DSS(Decentralized Security Smart Contract)를 사용하는데, 이는 스마트 컨트랙트와 연결된 비밀키로, 분산화된 보안을 제공합니다. 이를 통해서 개인은 자신의 펀드를 자율적으로 조절할 수 있습니다. 소비 제한, 일일 제한, 포트폴리오 관리, 출금 세팅과 같은 세부적인 조정과 통제가 가능하다고 합니다. 

3. 텐엑스페이토큰은 모든 블록체인이 연결된 새로운 프로토콜 COMIT (Cryptographically-secure Off-chain Multi-asset Instant Transaction)을 사용합니다. 이는 블록체인보다 발전된 양상의 네트워크로서, 텐엑스페이토큰이 실시간으로 분산화된 블록체인 간의 자산 거래를 가능하게 합니다. 구체적으로 ETF, 환전 서비스, 대출, 보안 등이 있습니다. 

활용 분야
(키워드: 가상화폐의 카드결제시스템)

텐엑스페이토큰은 가상화폐로 결제할 수 있는 체크카드를 제공함으로써 실생활에서 가상화폐가 차지하는 중요도를 증대시킬 것으로 보입니다. 또한, 비트코인 이외에도 이더리움, ERC20코인, 대시 등의 다양한 코인을 지원하기 때문에 가상화폐가 투자수단 이상의 일상 소비 영역으로 확장하는 데에 이바지할 것으로 보입니다.
description.ar:
TenX is a payment platform that facilitates digital and physical modes of transaction for cryptocurrencies to any merchant, even if they don’t accept cryptocurrencies. Physical and digital modes of course, include bank accounts, wallets, debit cards, cash and much more. The primary agenda of the company is to make it easier and faster to use cryptocurrency and accelerate adoption for the industry. The TenX blockchain supports the PAY token, which is the fuel that runs the network and is the cryptocurrency using which transactions on the network are made. 

TenX came into existence in 2011 and was created by Toby Hoenisch. While at the university, he took a keen interest in cryptography though he believed that there was no success for cryptocurrencies.In 2012, Toby started trading Bitcoin when he got to know a member of bitcoin-community who was not able to open an account in bank and used TenX crypto currency instead. Toby Hoenisch and Michael Sperk started a one-bit start up in 2015 and introduced us to a debit card, through which payments with bitcoin could be done. 

Cryptocurrency adoption is a longstanding problem - with most cryptocurrencies remaining relegated to the realms of hype and not seeing real-world usage, not as much as the enthusiasts would like, at least. This is an important problem being solved by the TenX coin, which seeks to make it easy for the end user to use cryptocurrencies by removing the hurdles associated with keeping different wallets and using them separately. As with all other investments, it is wise to do your own research, but seeing that TenX seems to be solving unique problems, it may certainly be worth a look.

Cryptocurrency adoption is a longstanding problem - with most cryptocurrencies remaining relegated to the realms of hype and not seeing real-world usage, not as much as the enthusiasts would like, at least. This is an important problem being solved by the TenX coin, which seeks to make it easy for the end user to use cryptocurrencies by removing the hurdles associated with keeping different wallets and using them separately. As with all other investments, it is wise to do your own research, but seeing that TenX seems to be solving unique problems, it may certainly be worth a look.
description.id:
TenX is a payment platform that facilitates digital and physical modes of transaction for cryptocurrencies to any merchant, even if they don’t accept cryptocurrencies. Physical and digital modes of course, include bank accounts, wallets, debit cards, cash and much more. The primary agenda of the company is to make it easier and faster to use cryptocurrency and accelerate adoption for the industry. The TenX blockchain supports the PAY token, which is the fuel that runs the network and is the cryptocurrency using which transactions on the network are made. 

TenX came into existence in 2011 and was created by Toby Hoenisch. While at the university, he took a keen interest in cryptography though he believed that there was no success for cryptocurrencies.In 2012, Toby started trading Bitcoin when he got to know a member of bitcoin-community who was not able to open an account in bank and used TenX crypto currency instead. Toby Hoenisch and Michael Sperk started a one-bit start up in 2015 and introduced us to a debit card, through which payments with bitcoin could be done. 

Cryptocurrency adoption is a longstanding problem - with most cryptocurrencies remaining relegated to the realms of hype and not seeing real-world usage, not as much as the enthusiasts would like, at least. This is an important problem being solved by the TenX coin, which seeks to make it easy for the end user to use cryptocurrencies by removing the hurdles associated with keeping different wallets and using them separately. As with all other investments, it is wise to do your own research, but seeing that TenX seems to be solving unique problems, it may certainly be worth a look.

ico_data.short_desc: Use your blockchain assets in real life
ico_data.description: COMIT compatible wallet, making global payments as cheap, fast and easy as sending a text message.

status_updates.description: You can now whitelist new rewards addresses for the TENX Tokens! Full details on the upgraded TENX Token Webapp here: https://blog.tenx.tech/tenx-token-webapp-2-0-new-address-whitelisting-now-available-fb3e836aff8f/

Hey TENX Token holders, today marks the start of the Q3 2019 rewards season! Your rewards accumulate daily and you can withdraw them anytime, at your convenience.  

Here's how you can withdraw the rewards on your TENX Tokens: 
 https://blog.tenx.tech/tenx-token-rewards-withdrawal-q3-2019-d97c4228cadd

What’s new in the TenX app versions 3.11.7 to 3.11.9?

🆙 UI enhancements
New transactions design 
🐞 Bug fixes (as always!) 

More about the update here:
https://blog.tenx.tech/whats-new-tenx-app-versions-3-11-7-to-3-11-9-96963dbc9d74

Hey crypto community, we're hosting a TenX x @Digix Livestream on 29 May at 7.00pm (GMT+8)! Paul Warrunthorn Kittiwongsunthorn and Shaun Djie will be discussing why tokenised assets are paving the way for the financial future, and taking questions along the way.

Click on 'Set reminder' here so you won't miss it:
https://youtu.be/e7_DZzeQk-g

This April at TenX we:

🗞 Published a Q1 Product Update and more info on the TENX Token
📹 Hosted livestreams: Q1 Update and TenX x CoinGecko
📌 Reintroduced the TenX Product Board
🍻 Met the community at several events

...and more! All about April:
https://blog.tenx.tech/tenx-shuttle-the-april-ride-fe3f8daaf1a4

Every time our compliance folks need to reject account verification documents, they get themselves a stress cookie. 🍪   Here's a short guide to help everyone achieve pain-free (and healthy) account verification in the TenX app:  
https://blog.tenx.tech/field-guide-to-successful-account-verification-bd383a9f9be5

Together, there are bigger wars to fight than winter. #GameofThrones #GameofCoins

https://youtu.be/soj2GDh1p4Y
